/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a driver's eye view of the city's daily life. The street is lined with lush green trees, providing a stark contrast to the urban buildings that flank it. A red truck and a white truck are parked on the side of the road, adding a splash of color to the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, and the sun shines brightly, illuminating the scene with a warm glow. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and gives a sense of being in the midst of the action.
